wikipedia_page.main: Georgina Mellor is a British actress best known for playing Anika Beevor in the ITV2 drama Footballers' Wives: Extra Time. She trained at Arden School of Theatre. Mellor appeared in Hollyoaks on 3 February 2012 playing Jen a driving examiner to Neil Cooper.

response: * 9 May – Georgina Mellor, British actress (Footballers' Wives: Extra Time)
